#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ll long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
#define mod 1000000007

void convert(int x, vector <int> &a)
{
    while (x) {
        a.pb(x%10);
        x /= 10;
    }
}

void multiply(vector <int> &a, vector <int> &b, vector <int> &c)
{
    int i, j, k, tmp;
    for (i = 0; i < a.size(); ++i) {
        for (j = 0, k = i; j < b.size(); ++j, ++k) {
            tmp = a[i]*b[j];
            if (k < c.size())
                c[k] += tmp;
            else
                c.pb(tmp);
        }
    }
    j = 0;
    for (i = 0; i < c.size(); ++i) {
        j += c[i];
        c[i] = j % 10;
        j /= 10;
    }
    while (j) {
        c.pb(j % 10);
        j /= 10;
    }
}

bool check(vector <int> &a, vector <int> &b)
{
    if (a.size() < b.size())
        return false;
    for (int i = b.size()-1, j = a.size()-1; i >= 0; --i, --j) {
        if (b[i] != a[j])
            return false;
    }
    return true;
}

int main()
{
    int t, x, y, i, u = 0;
    s(t);
    while (t--) {
        s(x);
        s(y);
        vector <int> a, b, c, d;
        convert(x, a);
        convert(y, b);
        c.pb(1);
        for (i = 1; ; ++i) {
            d.clear();
            multiply(a, c, d);
            if (check(d, b)) {
                printf("Case %d: %d\n", ++u, i);
                goto l1;
            }
            c.clear();
            c = d;
            /*for (int j = c.size()-1; j >= 0; --j)
                cout << c[j];
            cout << endl;*/
        }
        assert(0);
        l1: ;
    }
    return 0;
}
